story.text: I've operated a ham radio station off and on since college in the late '60s. I've also written radio related programs and even published an early one in QST.

These pages describe my adventure with the totally awesome FT8 digital mode that has been a sensation for three or four years now. Older pages describe past operations. [http://c2.com/ward/morse/ post]
